projects: [{"title":"Sentiment Analysis Model For Customer Satisfaction","start_date":"Apr 2020","end_date":"Jun 2020","description":"Worked on building a supervised machine learning model on sentiment analysis of customer satisfaction towards the products and services based on Natural Language Processing (NLP) technique using Python and Microsoft Power BI."},{"title":"Collusion Between Two Asymmetric Firms Under Complete Information","start_date":"2018","end_date":"2019","description":"A mathematical Economic study on the scope of collusion between two firms in a duopoly market with and without government intervention."},{"title":"Economics of Happiness","start_date":"Oct 2017","end_date":"Nov 2017","description":"Presented a paper on a quantitative and theoretical study of happiness and related concepts combining Economics with other fields."}]
